data.name: DefaultGraphQLHttpClient_SendAsync_RequestUriIsNull
data.value: The request URI is not set and the underlying HTTP client has no base address.

data.name: GraphQLHttpRequest_QueryNullOrEmpty
data.value: The provided GraphQL query is null or empty.

data.name: GraphQLHttpRequest_QueryIdAndExtensionsNullOrEmpty
data.value: Query, ID, and extensions cannot all be null. At least one must be provided for a valid GraphQL request

data.name: GraphQLHttpRequest_RequiresOneOrMoreRequests
data.value: The batch request must contain at least one request.

data.name: DefaultGraphQLHttpClient_BatchNotAllowed
data.value: The request body must be of type `OperationRequest` for HTTP GET requests.

data.name: DefaultGraphQLHttpClient_FileUploadNotAllowed
data.value: File uploads are not supported for HTTP GET requests.
